creditline: Gift of Mrs. C. C. Bovey
description: Toile, fragment of, with scenes from the life of Mary Stuart. To the left Mary is shown at the feet of Queen Elizabeth on a terrace surrounded by willow and other trees. An inscription at the upper right: "Marie Stuart Quittant La France;" one of the other scenes of the original piece. Copperplate engraving in rose on white.
title: Panel
